text: Hotel Hotti Bissau is a hotel in Bissau, Guinea-Bissau. The hotel was built, in 1989, as the Sheraton Hotel, and reopened as the Hotel Hotti Bissau on 1 August 1998. During the Guinea-Bissau Civil War the rebels used it as a headquarters. As of 1998 it had 165 rooms and 15 suites. It has since been subject to Libyan investment. ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Bissau Category:Hotels in Guinea-Bissau Category:Hotels established in 1989 Category:Hotel buildings completed in 1989
title: Hotel Hotti Bissau
